item.title: Stocks Steady to Start Short Christmas Eve Trading Session
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, in a holiday-shortened pre-Christmas trading session with all three major indexes gaining for the third trading day in a row.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip Slightly in Slow Holiday Trading
item.description: Gold futures slipped slightly amid low holiday trading volumes, reversing earlier gains.

item.title: Banks Sue Federal Reserve Over 'Lack of Transparency' in Stress Testing
item.description: The Fed on Monday said it planned to overhaul the stress-test regime for banks and planned to seek public comment on planned changes.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Gain in Quiet Trade
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures are higher in light trade, with participants focused on weather forecasts suggesting strong heating demand for January.

item.title: Sterling Loses Some of Its Shine
item.description: Sterling was up slightly against the dollar in early trade, but is no longer the best-performing G-10 currency in 2024, driven into second place by th...
